Upon checking on him, she knitted her brows.

Just then, Lu Ye slowly awakened and opened his eyes. With a blurred vision, he saw the woman sitting beside him. As their eyes met, Hua Ci chuckled and said, â€œOh, who is this man lying here? We meet again so soon? What are the odds?â€

On the side, Yi Yi started bawling upon hearing that. Ruan Ling Yu also felt a lump in her throat as her eyes reddened. Unable to hold it in anymore, she wrapped her arms around Yi Yi to allow the latter to rest against her chest and cry.

â€œWhy are youâ€¦ frightening these young girls?â€ Lu Ye said weakly. â€œDonâ€™tâ€¦ listen to her nonsense.â€ With a trembling hand, he fished out a bottle of pills from his Storage Bag.

In response, Lu Ye fished out another bottle of pills. It was then Hua Ci snorted and stealthily took the bottles before saying impassively, â€œWell, I can give it a try.â€ Then, she spoke to Ruan Ling Yu. â€œGet me a basin of hot water.â€ After that, she shifted her attention to Yi Yi. â€œYouâ€™ll stay here to help me.â€

Ruan Ling Yu grunted in agreement and dashed out of the room. On the other hand, Yi Yi was standing there and not knowing what to do. She turned to look at Lu Ye, only to see that he had passed out again.

â€œHeâ€™s not dead.â€ Hua Ci kept taking out things from her Storage Bag to get prepared. â€œHelp me take off his clothes.â€

â€œIâ€™ll do it!â€ Yi Yi hurriedly replied. It seemed as though she was asked to take off her own clothes. With a determined look on her face, she gritted her teeth and shuffled towards the bed.

Soon, hot water was ready. Hua Ci had already started treating Lu Ye as a green light surged around the room. The light felt warm and seemed able to nurture life. With a flushing face, Ruan Ling Yi darted out of the room and kept guard at the door, awaiting Hua Ciâ€™s orders. Under Hua Ciâ€™s guidance, Yi Yi soaked a towel with hot water and cleaned the dirt off Lu Yeâ€™s wounds.

Compared to his previous injuries, his wounds this time looked more horrifying, but in fact, they were less severe. That was because he was hurt by a weapon this time, whereas he had been wounded by spells previously, so the situations were different. However, there were too many wounds on his body, so it was difficult to handle them.

After brushing away the sweat on her forehead, Hua Ci turned to look at Yi Yi. â€œDo you want me to save the tiger?â€

Yi Yi dipped her head repeatedly. â€œYes.â€

Earlier, she had witnessed how Hua Ci saved Lu Ye. Following her treatment, his breathing had stabilized. Although his face was still pale, he was already in a much better state. That was how she knew that this alluring Senior Sister was a medicine cultivator. Amber was injured as well, but it wasnâ€™t as seriously wounded as Lu Ye. â€œHeâ€™ll also pay for the tigerâ€™s treatment, then,â€ Hua Ci said and left the room. A moment later, Amber was heard grunting from outside.

â€œLu Ye, youâ€™re awake!â€ Yi Yi was heard saying. The next instant, her face was just centimeters away from Lu Yeâ€™s as she stared at him in surprise.

Lu Ye flashed a smile at her. He wanted to sit up on the bed, but he was too weak to do so. Seeing that, Yi Yi quickly helped him up and let him rest against the headboard. Looking around, he saw Hua Ci sitting on the side with a bowl of green herbal juice in her hand. His expression became bitter.

â€œSince youâ€™re awake, you should drink this medicine.â€ Hua Ci leaned closer to him and passed him the bowl.

Lu Ye wanted to raise his hand, but he couldnâ€™t do so. That was why he looked pleadingly at her. A helpless Hua Ci rose from her chair and approached him. As she fed him the medicine, she said, â€œIt costs one Spirit Pill for feeding you the medicine.â€

â€œCoughâ€¦â€ Lu Ye almost choked to death. This evil woman was really crazy about money.

â€œIf you dare spit the medicine, Iâ€™ll stuff the bowl into your mouth,â€ Hua Ci uttered in a gentle tune with a smile on her face.

In disbelief, Yi Yi turned to look at Hua Ci as though the latter was a different person. After Hua Ci was done with feeding him the medicine, she checked on him again and nodded. â€œGiven your ample vitality, you can recover faster than most people.â€

She had mentioned the same thing previously. Lu Yeâ€™s vitality was stronger than that of most cultivators in the same Order, so initially, she suspected that he was going down the path of body tempering.

â€œWeâ€™ll start the treatment for today, then.â€ Hua Ci clapped her hands.

Immediately, Yi Yi sprinted out of the room. Lu Ye was puzzled at first, but after Hua Ci lifted the quilt, he realized that he was naked. Fortunately, his entire body was dressed up like he was a mummy. A green light started undulating. Lying on his stomach, Lu Ye felt the pain and numbness coming from his wounds.

â€œDidnâ€™t you tell me your name is Yi Ye?â€ Hua Ci suddenly asked. â€œWhy did Yi Yi call you Lu Ye?â€

Previously, Lu Ye had stayed in this place for half a month, so he had told her his name before.

â€œMy surname is Lu, and my name is Yi Ye,â€ Lu Ye explained with a straight face.

â€œOh, is it?â€ Hua Ci replied.

â€œGasp!â€ All of a sudden, Lu Ye felt an excruciating pain coming from his back.
